results.idea: Momentum of business sentiment vs earnings sentiment
results.description: Used rp_css_business (high userCount) and rp_css_earnings to capture relative momentum in business vs earnings news. Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining 2 fields, SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields), SUGGESTION3 applied ts_backfill due to coverage 0.5, SUGGESTION4 chosen high userCount fields. Kept implementation short (<=7 operators, <=2 fields) per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence set to 0.78 because both fields have strong user/alpha usage and complementary coverage.

Multiply composite business sentiment with impact projection to emphasize high-impact stories: rp_css_business and rp_nip_business. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 used ts_backfill for both; SUGGESTION4 preferred rp_css_business and rp_nip_business (high userCounts). Kept operators limited. Confidence 0.80 due to complementary signal of sentiment and impact.

results.idea: Short-term reversal on analyst recommendation change
results.description: Use nws18_ghc_lna (change in analyst recommendation) momentum mean-reversion. SUGGESTION1 single field (applied due to field importance), SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill applied, SUGGESTION4 applied because nws18_ghc_lna has high user/alpha counts. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.74 because analyst changes often move prices then mean-revert.

Combine event relevance and event sentiment for earnings: nws18_event_relevance and rp_ess_earnings. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill for both; SUGGESTION4 rp_ess_earnings chosen for high userCount. Implementation respects KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.76 because relevance+sentiment filters impactful earnings events.

results.idea: Price-news divergence: price-target vs price sentiment
results.description: Compare price-target sentiment rp_css_ptg with price-related sentiment rp_css_price to detect divergence. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 applied ts_backfill; SUGGESTION4 both fields have reasonable usage. Operators kept small. Confidence 0.7 given moderate historical effectiveness.

Weight investor-relations composite sentiment rp_css_inverstor by its impact projection rp_nip_inverstor to prioritize stories likely to move stock. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled both; SUGGESTION4 selected rp_nip_inverstor due to high userCount. Confidence 0.82 as investor-relations often leads to measurable moves.

Use rp_ess_mna event sentiment and rp_css_mna composite to capture momentum around merger announcements. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 used ts_backfill; SUGGESTION4 applied on rp_ess_mna (high alphaCount). Confidence 0.77 because M&A-driven moves are persistent.

Detect sudden rise in earnings-related composite sentiment rp_css_earnings relative to its short-term mean. SUGGESTION1 single field used due to clear semantics; SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION4 rp_css_earnings has strong usage. Implementation is compact. Confidence 0.79 since earnings sentiment often anticipates surprises.

Combine nws18_ghc_lna (recommendation change) with rp_css_ratings to amplify directional signal. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled both; SUGGESTION4 favors these high userCount fields. Confidence 0.75 because recommendations interact with ratings sentiment.

Use rp_css_product composite and rp_nip_product impact projection to find product news likely to move earnings. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 used higher userCount field rp_css_product. Confidence 0.72 given moderate evidence.

Combine rp_css_technical (technical-analysis sentiment) with rp_ess_technical event sentiment to detect technical-news alignment. SUGGESTION1 used both; ts_backfill applied due to coverage 0.5. SUGGESTION4 applied where available. Confidence 0.65 since technical sentiment is noisier.

Multiply general editorial sentiment nws18_qmb by nws18_event_relevance to prioritize relevant editorials. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled both; SUGGESTION4 not strongly required here. Confidence 0.6 due to editorial noisiness.

Combine rp_ess_insider (event sentiment) with rp_css_insider (composite) to amplify insider-related moves. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 chosen rp_ess_insider has good alphaCount. Confidence 0.73 as insider news tends to be informative.

Detect spikes in legal-related composite sentiment rp_css_legal and event sentiment rp_ess_legal. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 used rp_ess_legal (higher userCount). Confidence 0.66 because legal news is episodic.

Contrast revenue composite rp_css_revenue momentum against price-related sentiment rp_css_price to spot divergence. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled both; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.75 because revenue narratives often lead fundamentals.

Use rp_ess_ratings event sentiment and rp_nip_ratings impact projection to find rating-news with outsized expected impact. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 used high userCount rp_ess_ratings. Confidence 0.78 because rating changes are impactful.

Detect momentum in price-target composite rp_css_ptg vs analyst-change nws18_ghc_lna to find durable revisions. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 used high-use fields. Confidence 0.74.

Combine rp_css_marketing composite and rp_nip_marketing impact projection to highlight marketing-driven momentum. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 chosen rp_css_marketing for alphaCount. Confidence 0.62 (marketing stories less predictive).

Use rp_css_dividends and rp_ess_dividends to capture sentiment around dividend news. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 both have lower userCounts, so confidence reduced. Confidence 0.55 because dividend stories are rare.

Detect sudden surges in price-related composite rp_css_price and use ts_zscore for normalization. SUGGESTION1 single field used for clarity; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 rp_css_price has good usage. Confidence 0.7.

Combine rp_ess_partner (event) with rp_css_partner (composite) to capture partnership announcements with follow-through. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Use rp_css_credit_ratings and rp_nip_credit_ratings to capture credit rating stories with projected impact. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.63.
Short-term acceleration in rp_ess_revenue event sentiment, normalized cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Confidence 0.71.

Combine rp_css_society and rp_ess_society to detect social-issue driven risk. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields but both have low userCounts so SUGGESTION4 limited. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.5 due to noisiness and low coverage usefulness.
Use rp_css_assets composite and rp_ess_assets event sentiment to capture asset-related moves. SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.64.
Mean-reversion on rp_css_technical using ts_zscore reversed. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 lower userCount. Confidence 0.58 (technical sentiment noisy).

Multiply nws18_qep (global equity sentiment) by rp_nip_price to focus on editorials likely to affect price. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 used high alphaCount rp_nip_price. Confidence 0.66.
Use nws18_bee (growth of earnings sentiment) short-term zscore to capture upgrades in earnings tone. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Confidence 0.7.

Subtract rp_nip_business impact projection from rp_css_business composite to find stories with sentiment but low projected impact (contrarian). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 chosen high user counts. Confidence 0.61 as contrarian approach is riskier.

Cross-sectional zscore of rp_css_earnings after short-term momentum to capture leaders in earnings tone. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 used rp_css_earnings high usage. Confidence 0.77.

Detect when price-target sentiment rp_css_ptg rises but analyst ratings composite rp_css_ratings lags (mean-reversion/opportunity). SUGGESTION1 two fields; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.69.
Multiply rp_ess_partner with rp_nip_partner to find partnerships with projected high impact. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.67.
Compare rp_css_product momentum vs rp_css_marketing to find under-recognized product launches. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.63.
Subtract rp_nip_insider impact projection from rp_css_insider composite to find surprising insider sentiment. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.7.
Use ts_zscore on rp_ess_legal short-term delta to spot accelerating legal issues. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.68.

Multiply nws18_qep (global equity sentiment) with rp_css_business to find overall market-aligned business stories. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4 prioritized rp_css_business. Confidence 0.69.
Multiply nws18_event_relevance with rp_css_earnings to find relevant earnings news with strong tone. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.76.
Multiply nws18_ghc_lna with rp_css_price to prioritize recommendation changes that affect price narrative. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.72.
Add rp_css_revenue and rp_css_earnings momentum to find companies with unified positive revenue and earnings narratives. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.78.

results.idea: Price shock with low impact projection (contrarian)
results.description: Find cases where rp_css_price spikes but rp_nip_price remains low (possible short-term overreaction). SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
Use ts_ir on rp_css_earnings to measure persistent signal (mean/SD over lookback). SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence 0.75 because ts_ir captures persistence.
ts_zscore of ts_delta on rp_ess_partner to find accelerating partner stories. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.66.
Subtract rp_css_marketing momentum from rp_css_product to find genuine product-driven excitement. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.61.
Detect short-term jumps in rp_ess_inverstor (event) normalized cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.7.
Reverse ts_zscore of rp_css_credit to short high-credit-concern spikes (mean-reversion). SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.59.
Multiply rp_css_ptg with rp_css_ratings to find consensus confirmation of target changes. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.71.
zscore of ts_delta on rp_ess_technical to find technical signals with event backing. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.

Multiply nws18_bam (M&A sentiment) with rp_nip_mna impact projection to prioritize high-impact M&A news. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4 applied where possible. Confidence 0.8 because M&A moves are sizable.
Add rp_css_earnings delta and nws18_ghc_lna to find earnings tone supported by analyst changes. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.76.
Multiply rp_css_product with rp_nip_product (impact) and normalize. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.7.
Subtract nws18_qep momentum from rp_css_revenue momentum to find revenue moves not explained by market editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.65.
Compute ts_ir on rp_ess_insider to capture persistent insider-driven signals. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.72.
Multiply rp_ess_legal by reverse rp_css_ratings to flag legal news where ratings are deteriorating. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
Reverse zscore of short-term delta on rp_css_price to capture mean-reversion after spikes. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.66.
Subtract rp_css_inverstor momentum from rp_css_partner to find partnerships that lack investor-relations support. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.58.
Use ts_zscore on ts_delta of rp_css_ratings to capture fast-moving ratings narrative. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.73.
Add deltas of rp_css_ptg and rp_css_earnings to spot simultaneous upward revisions. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.74.
Multiply rp_css_credit and rp_css_earnings to identify earnings stories with credit risk. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.58.
Multiply nws18_qmb editorial sentiment with rp_css_assets composite to find asset-focused editorials likely to move prices. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.63.
Use nws18_event_similarity_days to penalize events similar to recent ones (fade repetitive stories). SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply rp_css_revenue with rp_css_ptg to find revenue-driven target changes. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.68.
Multiply rp_css_insider with nws18_ghc_lna to find analyst updates that coincide with insider activity. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.7.
Use rp_ess_labor event sentiment normalized to detect labor-related stress events. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.56.
Multiply nws18_qmb editorial sentiment with rp_css_marketing to find marketing stories with editorial lift. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.62.
Compute ts_ir on multiply(rp_css_price, rp_nip_price) to find persistent price-impact signals. SUGGESTION1 two fields combined; ts_backfill used for both; kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.74.
Multiply nws18_qep with rp_css_earnings to prioritize earnings items echoed by market editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.72.
Compute ts_ir on rp_ess_partner to find partners with persistent sentiment. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.67.
Cross-sectional zscore of ts_delta on nws18_ghc_lna to pick stocks with the strongest analyst-change momentum. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.75.
Multiply nws18_bam with rp_css_mna to find M&A stories both editorially and sentimentally strong. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.79.
ts_zscore of ts_delta on rp_css_ptg to capture rapid target sentiment changes. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.7.
Subtract rp_css_credit delta from rp_css_revenue delta to find revenue positive stories with low credit risk. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.65.
Multiply nws18_qep with rp_ess_earnings to prioritize earnings events echoed by editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.74.
Subtract rp_nip_inverstor from rp_css_inverstor to find investor-relations sentiment unsupported by impact projection (contrarian). SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
Add nws18_qmb and rp_css_product deltas to find product news with editorial amplification. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.67.
Subtract rp_css_ratings delta from rp_css_price delta to detect price moves not yet confirmed by ratings. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.66.
Reverse ts_zscore of combined rp_ess_mna and nws18_bam deltas to fade overreactions post-merger news. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply rp_css_earnings with rp_nip_earnings to prioritize earnings news with high projected impact. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.79.
Compute ts_ir on ts_delta of rp_css_price to find sustained price-sentiment movers. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.73.
Multiply nws18_ghc_lna with rp_nip_ratings to weight recommendation changes by projected ratings impact. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.71.
Add rp_css_product delta and rp_css_ptg delta to find product stories that change price targets. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.68.
Compute ts_ir on multiply(nws18_qmb, rp_css_marketing) to find persistent marketing-editorial signals. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.62.
ts_zscore on ts_delta of rp_nip_credit to detect accelerating credit risk impact. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.59.
Multiply nws18_qep with rp_css_inverstor to find investor-relations narratives amplified by global editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.7.
Multiply rp_ess_earnings with nws18_event_relevance to select only highly relevant earnings events. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.77.
Reverse ts_zscore of rp_css_ptg delta to fade sudden target-sentiment spikes. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
ts_ir on rp_css_partner to find partners with sustained positive narratives. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.66.
Multiply nws18_qep with ts_delta(rp_css_price) to capture editorial-driven price acceleration. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.71.
Multiply deltas of rp_css_earnings and rp_css_revenue to find strong fundamental narratives. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.76.
Multiply nws18_qmb with rp_css_insider to find insider stories with editorial backing. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.69.
Subtract rp_ess_legal delta from rp_css_earnings delta to penalize earnings narrative with legal concerns. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply nws18_qep with rp_css_credit_ratings to find credit rating stories echoed by editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Price surge followed by low-impact projection (fade)
results.description: Identify rp_css_price spikes where rp_nip_price is low and apply mean-reversion (reverse). SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.58.
Compute ts_ir on multiply(rp_css_earnings, nws18_qep) to find persistent editorial-backed earnings signals. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.75.
Subtract ts_delta(rp_css_ratings) from ts_delta(nws18_ghc_lna) to find recommendation changes not yet reflected in ratings. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.68.
Multiply rp_css_product delta with rp_css_ptg delta to prioritize product news moving price targets. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.67.
Subtract rp_css_inverstor delta from rp_css_earnings delta to find earnings stories lacking IR confirmation (contrarian). SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.6.
ts_ir on multiply(nws18_bam, rp_css_mna) to find enduring M&A narratives with editorial support. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.78.
Multiply rp_css_ptg with rp_nip_price to find target changes that are likely to move price. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.7.
Use ts_count_nans on rp_ess_earnings over lookback to filter stable signals (lower NaNs => reliable). SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill applied beforehand. Confidence 0.64.
Use quantile(rank) of nws18_ghc_lna delta to pick top decile of analyst-change movers. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used; quantile applied. Confidence 0.74.
Multiply nws18_qep with rp_ess_partner to find partner events amplified by editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.66.
ts_mean of ts_delta on rp_css_price to capture sustained price sentiment direction. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.72.
Subtract nws18_qep from rp_css_earnings momentum to find earnings stories not supported by market editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.63.
ts_ir on multiply(rp_css_insider, nws18_qmb) to capture persistent insider-editorial signals. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.71.
Subtract nws18_qmb delta from rp_css_product delta to find product stories overlooked by editorials. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.62.
ts_ir on rp_css_ptg to find persistent target-sentiment moves. SUGGESTION1 single field; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.69.
Multiply nws18_ghc_lna with rp_nip_inverstor to weight recommendation changes by IR impact projection. SUGGESTION1 two fields; ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.7.
